attributes.action: support independance for the ancient kingdom of Galloway in the event of SNP holding and winning a referendum on Scottish independance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Galloway (in the southwest of Scotland)was for a long period of time recognised as a nation in its own right, independant from both the crowns of England and Scotland.  A great many people in this area consider themselves to be Gallovidians (or Gallowegians)rather than Scots, and would accordingly wish to be independant from Scotland and free to follow their own political destiny.
